item.title: New markings broken up., 19th February
item.description:
The end of road, road markings recently installed have largely now disappeared. The white lining started breaking up within 2 weeks after installation. It is a dangerous junction as the school uses it as a drop off area, and cars often cut across the corner when entering the road without effective road markings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a large and deep pothole on North Circular Road, nearest location point is Courtleigh Gardens. There are no other easy references while driving, 19th February
item.description:

item.title: Potholes need temporary fixing again, 19th February
item.description:
Hello I reported this issue ref:93FN two days ago on Tuesday morning. The potholes were temporarily fixed later that day but have re-emerged less than 48 hours later. Passing traffic is once again causing reverberations in an adjoining residential building with a steel frame structure. We accept the measures taken on Tuesday were not permanent but we need something more robust to be put in place before long term hot fixing. Please note, this is a major road serving two busy bus routes and other heavy traffic. Kindly advise.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Northwold Road, West Hackney, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping... continues!, 19th February
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous steps, 19th February
item.description:
Metal pole sticking up about 2 inch on steps leading to Footscray Meadows just before All Saints church. I tripped on this, this morning, luckily l managed to steady myself or l would have fallen down the steps. These steps are badly in need of repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 167, Rectory Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
